meanings.definition: The art or craft of creating decorative objects using shells.
meanings.sent1: She learned about shellworks in art class.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed beautiful shellworks from different artists.
meanings.sent3: The shellworks on the shelf looked like a tiny beach.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a shellworks wonderland, with shells everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The intricate shellworks sparkled in the sunlight, mesmerizing all who saw them.

meanings.definition: A collection of decorative objects made from shells.
meanings.sent1: The beach house was filled with unique shellworks.
meanings.sent2: She added a new piece to her growing shellworks collection.
meanings.sent3: The shellworks on the table seemed to whisper stories of the sea.
meanings.sent4: His room was a treasure trove of shellworks, each piece holding memories.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the shellworks brightened up the room, bringing a touch of the ocean indoors.
